remarks: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for product: if ` x ` is (effectively) not free in ` A ` and ` B ` , it is not free in ` prod_ k e. A B ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Dec-2017.)
statement:
nfcprod.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
nfcprod.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
nfcprod $p |- F/_ x prod_ k e. A B $.
$d k x $.
